Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: So... hello? Can you understand me?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: I guess that is a yes… So, what are you exactly?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: This is going to be tough… Do you have a name?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Why would the empire want a small, green and wrinkled creature like you?

Lines.Speaker: Grogu
Lines.Text: *Raises Its hand with Its tiny finger pointing directly at him*

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: *Gets his finger close to the child’s and both graze briefly, Mando feels like some sort of connection between them*

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: I must be getting crazy… What am I, a babysitter?
